title: Emmerdale spoilers: Is Faith Nate's mum in mindblowing Cain twist?
text:
Ever since Nate Robinson (Jurell Carter) yelled the words that he is Cain Dingle’s (Jeff Hordley) son in Emmerdale as they fought on the boat, viewers have been sharing their theories online – some intriguing and some downright madcap.

With no details yet divulged on who Nate’s mum is, one of the leading nuggets of speculation is that Faith (Sally Dexter) might be Nate’s mum and that the farm hand is either lying or mistaken over who his dad is.

We saw Faith scraffling through Nate’s belongings in the caravan and when she came across a photograph, she sank to the floor in despair with her head in her hands as the pieces of the puzzle fitted together.

She clearly had clicked who Nate is and tonight, she decides against confronting the situation, deciding that Cain and Nate need to have it out. Of course, this could very easily be a fight to the death – with Moira (Natalie J Robb) trapped in the depths of the lake and the boat about to be obliterated by an explosion, not everyone might make it out of the big fight alive.

Advertisement

Advertisement

But if they do, there are lots of questions to be answered. Why is Faith so troubled – has she recognised the woman Cain slept with or has she realised that Nate has the wrong end of the stick?

If Nate is indeed Cain’s son, then who is the mother? And did Cain know that he had a child out there?

Faith’s definitely his mum, they did air her in the scenes for no reason, come on guys — Connor Byrne (@connorbyrne83) October 23, 2019

I have this strong feeling that Faith is Nate's mum.. by the look on her face. #Emmerdale — Lauren (@BeauchampLove) October 23, 2019

I don’t think Nate is cains son, either he is faiths son or faith helped with his fake adoption and used cains name and that’s how faith leaves #Emmerdale — Leanne White (@Mammy_white) October 22, 2019

So much intrigue – but whatever Faith is hiding, it leads to her being driven out of the village for some time, potentially forever. Sally confirmed her exit from the show to Metro.co.uk, indicating that Nate’s true identity would the cause of Faith ‘having to go away for a little while’.

While Sally is up for returning to the role, no confirmation at this stage has been made whether the exit is permanent. But it seems clear that there is more drama to come before she goes anywhere.

Emmerdale continues on Wednesday 23rd October at 7pm on ITV.

Advertisement Advertisement
description: Fans are guessing that all is not as it seems.
